## Container.defaultProps property

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static defaultProps: {
        dockerHost: string;
        autoRemove: boolean;
        ports: never[];
        stdinOpen: boolean;
        tty: boolean;
        portBindings: {};
        environment: {};
        links: {};
        imagePullPolicy: string;
    };
```
